name: Samsara.Build
description: Samsara ($SAMS) is a revolutionary platform that democratizes the creation and deployment of AI agents, making advanced artificial intelligence accessible to everyone. By combining cutting-edge AI technology with blockchain integration, Samsara enables users to build, deploy, and monetize custom AI assistants without any coding knowledge. This outlines Samsara's vision to transform both traditional businesses and the Web3 ecosystem. Key features of Samsara include: No-code AI agent builder Seamless integration with popular platforms like Telegram and Twitter Decentralized marketplace for AI agent monetization Native token ($SAMS) powering the ecosystem Bridge between real-world applications and Web3 technologies Samsara aims to empower individuals and businesses to harness the power of AI, creating a new paradigm of human-AI interaction and economic opportunity.
